message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. Would you like to buy it from me for $90?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to pay less than $90. Could you consider $85?
I understand you're looking to pay less, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can do $88 for you. Would you be interested?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, could you possibly lower the price to $86?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $87 for you, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. What do you think?
